all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Wherefore, lift up thy heart and rejoice, and cleave unto the covenants which thou hast made.
Doctrine and Covenants 25:13
Quote of the Day
"How different our decisions would be if we really knew who we really are."
Rubén V. Alliaud | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
